category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA83_create_ACAD_attr_Form
preference.preference_description: This option can be used for enabling the automatic creation of the Named Reference ACAD_attr form. The ACAD_attr form can be used to implement attribute mapping. Enabling the creation of the ACAD_attr form will impact save and update operation performance. Possible values: 0 - ACAD_attr form is not created (Default) 1 - ACAD_attr form is created
